meanings.definition: The quality or state of being active.
meanings.sent1: Her activeness in sports is truly impressive.
meanings.sent2: The activeness of the children at the playground was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The activeness of the puppy chasing its tail was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The activeness of the city never seemed to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The activeness of the volcano was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The capacity for vigorous activity; energy.
meanings.sent1: His activeness in the gym helped him stay fit.
meanings.sent2: The activeness of the engine indicated it was in good condition.
meanings.sent3: The activeness of the squirrel gathering nuts was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The activeness of the market reflected a thriving economy.
meanings.sent5: The activeness of the storm made it clear it was not to be underestimated.
